os.fullpath: Operating System :: Modern (Vendor-Supported) Desktop Operating Systems :: Windows 7

name: Windows 7 God Mode Tool
short_description:
One of the secrets of Windows 7 that is undocumented by Microsoft is the secret option known as God Mode.

GodMode is simply a hidden control panel that contains everything about windows 7 configuration options and settings, all located in one place plus additional features that are not easily found in the ordinary Control Panel.

This utility will either enable or disable this functionality. When enabled, it will create a shortcut to the God Mode window on a users desktop. When disabled, this shortcut will obviously be removed.
summary: Simple little app used to enable and disable God Mode in Windows 7.
